description: This Test Close PopUp Window, Then Clicks on Language Button And  Clicks German Language ButtonAfter It Test Makes Flag Validation and Asserts That German Flag Is Shown Correctly, Then Test Using Rest Assured And With The Help Of It Finds Outs What Language Is The Given Text fromAnd Finally It Validates That The Language Has Been Changed Correctly
